title: 'No More Colonial-Era Danda-Based Policing, Use Tech Now': Amit Shah - NDTV
content: 'No More Colonial-Era Danda-Based Policing, Use Tech Now': Amit Shah  NDTV
description: The colonial-era "danda-based policing is over", Home Minister Amit Shah said at a police event in Madhya Pradesh's Bhopal today.
